text: Here is the one you've been waiting for! This beautifully renovated Lakefront Holiday Village beauty will not disappoint. From the moment you pull up out front, you can't help but notice how impeccably taken care of this home is. Enter through the front door and notice the much-desired open concept. The entire interior has been renovated to include new hardwood floors, new interior doors and hardware, new window treatments, two completely renovated bathrooms, new light fixtures, wall switches, and recessed lighting, and it has been completely repainted! The new kitchen with table space is a chef's dream, with new shaker custom cabinets, quartz countertops, and GE Profile stainless appliances. An additional wall of cabinets was added to create pantry space and a wonderful coffee bar. The dining room is large enough to host family holiday gatherings, and being open to the living room makes entertaining a breeze. Beyond the living room is the sunroom. It might just be your favorite spot to sit as the skylights allow so much natural light to shine through, and the view of the lake is absolutely serene! The primary bedroom is spacious with a new ceiling fan and has a custom-designed walk-in closet. The renovated primary bathroom features a double vanity and a walk-in shower with custom Carrara chevron tile. This room also faces the lake, so you can wake up in the morning to look out at the beautiful view of the water. In the second bedroom, you will find a new ceiling fan and a good-sized closet. The new hall bath also features a tub/shower combination and custom shower tile. Down the hall, you find the laundry room with a brand-new washer and dryer. This room also houses the heater and air conditioning systems, which were installed in 2024. Outside the sunroom is the paved patio space. This is the best place to enjoy your morning coffee or evening glass of wine. The much sought-after-lake view in this community is not easy to get! The attached garage comes with an extra refrigerator. Aside from all of this, you have nothing to do but unpack and enjoy the home. No more grass-cutting or snow shoveling here! The community heated pool is wonderful to enjoy on summer days, and the Club House has many activities as well. This one will not last long!
